title: Installed capacity - all kinds
description: Total installed capacity of all distributed generation, not including storage or flexibility

title: Installed capacity - renewable
description: Total installed capacity of all distributed renewable generation, not including storage or flexibility

title: Installed capacity - fossil fuels
description: Total installed capacity of all distributed fossil fuel generation.

title: Installed capacity - all wind
description: Total installed capacity of all distributed wind generation.

title: Installed capacity - solar
description: Total installed capacity of all distributed solar generation.

title: Annual demand
description: Total annual demand including electric vehicle and heat pumps

title: Annual baseline demand
description: Total baseline demand, not including electric vehicle or heat pumps

title: Total available battery storage
description: Capacity of distribution connected battery storage available

title: Total available pumped hydro
description: Capacity of pumped hydro systems avaialble.

title: Available capacity - Vehicle to grid
description: Total available capacity that could be stored in electric vehicles

title: Number of heat pumps
description: Number of heat pumps including hybrids in domestic and non-domestic customers.

title: Households on district heating
description: Number of households that are connected to some form of district heating.

title: Total Heat Pump Demand
description: Total demand from domestic and non-domestic heat pumps.

title: Battery Electric Vehicles
description: Number of pure battery electric vehicles in region, not including plug in hybrids

title: Plug in hybrid
description: Number of plug in hybrids in region

title: Electric vehicle demand
description: Total demand for charging electric vehicles.
